fields.title: Instagram Ad
fields.template_text: Write a compelling Instagram ad for a [business_type] located in [business_location], aimed at [target_audience]. Highlight why [business_name] is the best choice.

fields.title: Email Subject Line
fields.template_text: Create 5 engaging email subject lines for a [business_type] in [business_location] that wants to attract more [target_audience].

fields.title: Local Service Promotion
fields.template_text: Write a short Facebook post promoting [business_name], a [business_type] based in [business_location], designed to appeal to [target_audience]. Include a strong call-to-action.

fields.title: Landing Page Intro
fields.template_text: Write a welcoming introduction paragraph for the landing page of [business_name], a [business_type] in [business_location], focusing on attracting [target_audience].
